@@ -147,1 +147,1 @@ - public static KeyBinding ctrl(KeyCode code) { + public static KeyBinding control(KeyCode code) { @@ -158,1 +158,1 @@ - public static KeyBinding ctrlShift(KeyCode code) { + public static KeyBinding controlShift(KeyCode code) { @@ -167,0 +167,1 @@ + * On macOS, it is equivalent to calling {@link #alt(KeyCode)}. @@ -213,2 +214,0 @@ - *

- * This method returns {@code null} on non-macOS platforms. @@ -275,1 +274,1 @@ - * Creates a {@link Builder} with the specified KeyCode. + * Creates a {@link Builder} with the specified {@code KeyCode}. @@ -459,1 +458,16 @@ - /** Key bindings builder */ + /** + * A builder for {@code KeyBinding} objects. + *

+ * By default, its {@code build} method creates a key {@code KEY_PRESSED} binding. This can be changed + * by calling either {@link #keyReleased()} or {@link #keyTyped()}. + *

+ * The builder pattern can be used when convenience methods such as + * {@link KeyBinding#control(KeyCode)} or + * {@link KeyBinding#shiftShortcut(KeyCode)} + * are not sufficient. + *

+ * Example: + * {@code + * KeyBinding.builder(KeyCode.TAB).control().option().shift().build() + * } + */ @@ -470,1 +484,1 @@ - * Sets on KEY_RELEASED condition. + * Sets the KEY_RELEASED condition, clearing KEY_PRESSED and KEY_TYPED. @@ -473,1 +487,1 @@ - public Builder onKeyReleased() { + public Builder keyReleased() { @@ -481,1 +495,1 @@ - * Sets on KEY_TYPED condition. + * Sets the KEY_TYPED condition, clearing KEY_PRESSED and KEY_RELEASED. @@ -484,1 +498,1 @@ - public Builder onKeyTyped() { + public Builder keyTyped() { @@ -492,1 +506,1 @@ - * Sets the {@code alt} key down condition (the {@code Option} key on macOS). + * Sets the {@code alt} key down condition (the {@code option} key on macOS). @@ -501,1 +515,1 @@ - * Sets the {@code alt} key down condition (the {@code Option} key on macOS). + * Sets or clears the {@code alt} key down condition (the {@code option} key on macOS). @@ -513,1 +527,5 @@ - * Sets {@code command} key down condition. + * Sets the {@code command} key down condition on macOS. + *

+ * Setting this condition on non-macOS platforms will result in the + * {@code build} method returning {@code null}. + * @@ -522,1 +540,5 @@ - * Sets {@code command} key down condition. + * Sets or clears the {@code command} key down condition on macOS. + *

+ * Setting this condition on non-macOS platforms will result in the + * {@code build} method returning {@code null}. + * @@ -534,1 +556,1 @@ - * Sets {@code control} key down condition. + * Sets the {@code control} key down condition. @@ -537,1 +559,1 @@ - public Builder ctrl() { + public Builder control() { @@ -543,1 +565,1 @@ - * Sets {@code control} key down condition. + * Sets or clears the {@code control} key down condition. @@ -547,1 +569,1 @@ - public Builder ctrl(boolean on) { + public Builder control(boolean on) { @@ -555,1 +577,1 @@ - * Sets {@code meta} key down condition. + * Sets the {@code meta} key down condition. @@ -564,1 +586,1 @@ - * Sets {@code meta} key down condition. + * Sets or clears the {@code meta} key down condition. @@ -576,1 +598,5 @@ - * Sets {@code option} key down condition. + * Sets the {@code option} key down condition on macOS. + *

+ * Setting this condition on non-macOS platforms will result in the + * {@code build} method returning {@code null}. + * @@ -585,1 +611,5 @@ - * Sets {@code option} key down condition. + * Sets or clears the {@code option} key down condition on macOS. + *

+ * Setting this condition on non-macOS platforms will result in the + * {@code build} method returning {@code null}. + * @@ -597,1 +627,1 @@ - * Sets {@code shift} key down condition. + * Sets the {@code shift} key down condition. @@ -606,1 +636,1 @@ - * Sets {@code shift} key down condition. + * Sets or clears the {@code shift} key down condition. @@ -618,1 +648,1 @@ - * Sets {@code shortcut} key down condition. + * Sets the {@code shortcut} key down condition. @@ -627,1 +657,1 @@ - * Sets {@code shortcut} key down condition. + * Sets or clears the {@code shortcut} key down condition. @@ -653,1 +683,2 @@ - * Creates a new {@link KeyBinding} instance. + * Creates a new {@link KeyBinding} instance from the current settings. + *
